source: app.uniswap.org HTML inline styles + preload tags

w8o and O8o include durations and cubic-bezier timings.
IBM Plex Mono and Inter/InterVariable are explicit in official package files.
Intermediate stops are interpolated for reusable Tailwind semantics.
